title: New Seasonal Item R&D
system_mod: Approach cocktail development as a collaborative R&D process, balancing creativity with service feasibility.
venue_context: A full-service restaurant wants to add a seasonal cocktail to their menu. Recipes should be original but executable by a professional bar team within a seasonal prep window.
